messages.title: YOUR LOCAL CHOICE
messages.content: Grew up here and is proud of this community. Only candidate that will speak up for local issues in Parliament all year round with a local constituency office. Fights for vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 100% committed to serving the constituency, including holding regular surgeries.
Speak out for funding, fight for a strong NHS.
Stop cuts to local schools, contend against the cuts and fight for children's futures.
Bring good jobs to Corby and East Northamptonshire.
Deal that works for everyone, aimed at protecting jobs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only candidate that will speak up for local issues in Parliament.

issues.economy: Bring good jobs to Corby and East Northamptonshire.
issues.health: Speak out for funding for the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Grew up here and is proud of this community.

endorsements.endorsement: ‘I’ve seen the damage the Tories have done to our NHS and I trust Beth to fight for our services.’
‘I trust Beth to tackle the big issues affecting young and older people in Corby and East Northamptonshire.
‘I care about our NHS. That’s why I’m backing Beth.’

images.caption: Beth Miller with group of supporters

leaflet.additionalNotes: Comparisons are made between Labour and Conservative positions, emphasizing contrasting approaches to public services and workers' rights.
